product.name: SmartServer with i.LON Vision: EnOcean SmartServer: v2.2 SR8/SP8 (4.12.006) with i.LON Vision v2.2 SR8/SP8 (4.12.006)

branches.name: EnOcean Edge Inc, a subsidiary of EnOcean GmbH-

notes.text: The affected product, Echelon SmartServer 2.2 with i.LON Vision 2.2, stores cleartext credentials in a file, which could allow an attacker to obtain cleartext usernames and passwords of the SmartServer. If the attacker obtains the file, then the credentials could be used to control the web user interface and file transfer protocol (FTP) server.-CVE-2022-3089 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 6.3 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:L/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:L/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: For additional mitigations and workarounds, users should refer to EnOcean's hardening guide.
